xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/451283-Blocked 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1MX1WWUUg6pib9hyslVfaR7D2Ek.jpg Struggling author Samuel suffers from a whopping case of writer's block and, as a result, can't pay his rent. Forced to take in a roommate to cover costs, he's now inexorably tied to his housemate's felonious activities. But Sam hesitates to take action -- because suddenly he's inspired to write a killer story. Director James Roberts's quirky film ponders just how far a writer will go for the story of his life. Blocked
